scripts.check: npm run check:format -- --list-different && npm run check:lint
scripts.commit: npm run fix && git commit -am "chore: Generated release files"
scripts.dist: npm run clean && npm run build && attw --pack . --ignore-rules cjs-resolves-to-esm
scripts.fix: npm run fix:format && npm run fix:lint
scripts.postversion: git push origin && git push origin --tags && npm publish --access public && git reset --hard
scripts.preversion: git checkout main && git pull && npm install && npm run test && npm run dist
scripts.release:major: generate-changelog -M -x "chore,test" && npm run docs && npm run commit && npm version major
scripts.release:minor: generate-changelog -m -x "chore,test" && npm run docs && npm run commit && npm version minor
scripts.release:patch: generate-changelog -p -x "chore,test" && npm run docs && npm run commit && npm version patch
scripts.test: npm run test:types && npm run test:imports && npm run test:unit:coverage
